description: Try our easy to follow Baked Sausages With Potatoes recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Baked Sausages With Potatoes Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Slowly add the beef stock to the pan, whisking constantly until combined. Bring to the boil, then reduce the heat and simmer for 2 minutes. Strain through a fine sieve and serve with sausages and vegetables.
